Package com.attendace.controller

Class CourseController

java.lang.Object
com.attendace.controller.CourseController
public class CourseController extends Object
Controller for managing course-related operations. Provides methods to create, update, remove, and retrieve courses.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs a new CourseController and initializes the handler.

  • Method Details

    • createCourse

      public boolean createCourse(String courseName, String courseTopic, String courseDesc, boolean attendanceAvailable, String attendanceKey, int minAttendance, int maxAttendance, boolean courseActive)
      Creates a new course with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      courseName - the name of the course
      courseTopic - the topic of the course
      courseDesc - the description of the course
      attendanceAvailable - whether attendance is available for the course
      attendanceKey - the attendance key for the course
      minAttendance - the minimum attendance required
      maxAttendance - the maximum attendance allowed
      courseActive - whether the course is active
      Returns:
      true if the course was created successfully, false otherwise

    • updateCourse

      public boolean updateCourse(int value, String label, String setValue)
      Updates a course with the specified value, label, and new value.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to identify the course
      label - the label (column) to identify the course
      setValue - the new value to set
      Returns:
      true if the course was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • removeCourse

      public boolean removeCourse(int value, String label)
      Removes a course based on the specified value and label.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to identify the course
      label - the label (column) to identify the course
      Returns:
      true if the course was removed successfully, false otherwise

    • getAllCourses

      public List<ArrayList<Object>> getAllCourses()
      Retrieves all courses.
      Returns:
      a list of all courses, each represented as an ArrayList of objects

    • getCourse

      public List<String> getCourse(String value, String label)
      Retrieves a course based on the specified value and label.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to identify the course
      label - the label (column) to identify the course
      Returns:
      a list of course data fields

    • getCourseById

      public List<String> getCourseById(int courseid)
      Retrieves a course by its ID.
      Parameters:
      courseid - the ID of the course
      Returns:
      a list of course data fields

    • getStaffsCourses

      public List<Integer> getStaffsCourses(int staffId)
      Retrieves the list of course IDs associated with a staff member.
      Parameters:
      staffId - the ID of the staff member
      Returns:
      a list of course IDs
